articles.title: Air pollution: 5 at-home exercises for weight loss - India Today
articles.description: Inhaling polluted air can cause several illnesses. It is better to exercise indoors. Here are some exercises to help you on your weight loss journey.
articles.content: These exercises, which include squats, lunges, planks, push-ups, pull-ups, shoulder presses, and stackers, target multiple muscle groups and can be easily performed at home.
